@description.name: @description
@description.body:
*****************************************************************

qooxdoo - the new era of web development http://qooxdoo.org Copyright: 2004-2008 1&1 Internet AG, Germany, http://www.1und1.de License: MIT: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT See the LICENSE file in the project's top-level directory for details. Authors: Sebastian Werner (wpbasti) Fabian Jakobs (fjakobs) *

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The scroll bar widget, is a special slider, which is used in qooxdoo instead of the native browser scroll bars. Scroll bars are used by the {@link qx.ui.container.Scroll} container. Usually a scroll bar is not used directly.

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: button-begin {qx.ui.form.RepeatButton} button to scroll to top

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body:
button-end {qx.ui.form.RepeatButton} button to scroll to bottom *Example* Here is a little example of how to use the widget. 
   var scrollBar = new qx.ui.core.scroll.ScrollBar("horizontal");
   scrollBar.set({
     maximum: 500
   })
   this.getRoot().add(scrollBar);
This example creates a horizontal scroll bar with a maximum value of 500. *External Documentation* Documentation of this widget in the qooxdoo manual.
@childControl.description:
button to scroll to bottom *Example* Here is a little example of how to use the widget. 
   var scrollBar = new qx.ui.core.scroll.ScrollBar("horizontal");
   scrollBar.set({
     maximum: 500
   })
   this.getRoot().add(scrollBar);
This example creates a horizontal scroll bar with a maximum value of 500. *External Documentation* Documentation of this widget in the qooxdoo manual.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: orientation {String?"horizontal"} The initial scroll bar orientation

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Change event for the value.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The scroll bar orientation

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The maximum value (difference between available size and content size).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Position of the scrollbar (which means the scroll left/top of the attached area's pane) Strictly validates according to {@link #maximum}. Does not apply any correction to the incoming value. If you depend on this, please use {@link #scrollTo} instead.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Step size for each tap on the up/down or left/right buttons.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The amount to increment on each event. Typically corresponds to the user pressing PageUp or PageDown.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Factor to apply to the width/height of the knob in relation to the dimension of the underlying area.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{Map} The map with the preferred width/height and the allowed
   minimum and maximum values.
@return.description:
The map with the preferred width/height and the allowed
   minimum and maximum values.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
left {Integer} Any integer value for the left position,
   always in pixels
@param.description:
Any integer value for the left position,
   always in pixels

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
top {Integer} Any integer value for the top position,
   always in pixels
@param.description:
Any integer value for the top position,
   always in pixels

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
width {Integer} Any positive integer value for the width,
   always in pixels
@param.description:
Any positive integer value for the width,
   always in pixels

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
height {Integer} Any positive integer value for the height,
   always in pixels
@param.description:
Any positive integer value for the height,
   always in pixels

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} A map of which layout sizes changed.
@return.description: A map of which layout sizes changed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@param.body:
id {String} ID of the child control. If a # is used, the id is
   the part in front of the #.
@param.description:
ID of the child control. If a # is used, the id is
   the part in front of the #.

hash {String?undefined} If a child control name contains a #,
   all text following the # will be the hash argument.

If a child control name contains a #,

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls to the given position. This method automatically corrects the given position to respect the {@link #maximum}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: position {Integer} Scroll to this position. Must be greater zero.
@param.description: Scroll to this position. Must be greater zero.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: duration {Number} The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.
@param.description: The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls by the given offset. This method automatically corrects the given position to respect the {@link #maximum}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: duration {Number} The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.
@param.description: The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls by the given number of steps. This method automatically corrects the given position to respect the {@link #maximum}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: duration {Number} The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.
@param.description: The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Updates the position property considering the minimum and maximum values.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: If a scroll animation is running, it will be stopped.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Executed when the up/left button is executed (pressed)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e {qx.event.type.Event} Execute event of the button

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Executed when the down/right button is executed (pressed)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e {qx.event.type.Event} Execute event of the button

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Change listener for slider animation end.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Change listener for slider value changes.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Hide the knob of the slider if the slidebar is too small or show it otherwise.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property orientation. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #orientation}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property pageStep. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #pageStep}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property pageStep. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #pageStep}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property pageStep. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #pageStep}.
